author: yorickdowne

author: m.kalinin
content: These are the terms we have come to after debates on the terminology around the merge. Execution Environment is the term that YP introduces when reads about execution model but it rather the environment itself than something that user interacts with. There is also a term "execution agent" in the YP which is pretty close to execution client. After the merge, Ethereum node will consist of the following pieces:  consensus (beacon chain) client and execution client; validators will have to run validator client as well.
